question:
You are experiencing financial problems and want to ask your landlord if you can pay your rent late. Write a letter to your landlord.
In your letter explain:
Why you are writing to him
Why you cannot pay the rent
When you will pay the rent.
text: I am writing this letter to request you to give me an extension in time to pay my rent.

I hired your apartment back in the year 2016 at a payment of 30k and since then I have been paying my rent in time. However, I am currently going across some financial crisis due to which I am not able to pay the payment at this moment.

Unfortunately last month, due to downsizing in my company, it has reduced its number of employees. Therefore, I was one of those people. Despite the fact that my performance was above expectations, they decided to terminate my job contract. Nonetheless, I don't have any other source of income to pay the money.

In fact, I am trying hard to hunt for a new job so I can start my normal routine. Moreover, I would be able to get off this situation by the end of this month. Thus, I will pay off the rent for this and the next month together till then please bestow me an extension.
I look forward to hearing from you soon.
